errors.error_description: Specifies Python 2.7 as required version when gsutil now supports Python 3.x
correction_candidates: Make sure to install Python 3.7 or later as gsutil requires this version to function properly.
Make sure to install Python 3.6+ as gsutil has dropped Python 2 support.
Ensure you have Python 3.8 or newer installed for optimal gsutil performance.
Install Python 3.7 through 3.11 as these are the supported Python versions for gsutil.
errors.golden_answer: Make sure to install Python 3.7 or later as gsutil requires this version to function properly.
